(as of Nov 30,2022 07:49:38 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Founded in 2015, Sealegend is focused on helping people reduce cleaning burdens, reduce safety hazards and improve the happiness.

Sealegend’s mission is to provide quality and cost-effective products, spread home cleaning concepts and a healthy lifestyle.

We have been working on dryer vent cleaning products and our products have reached a good use function. In order to meet different customer needs, we have also developed more different styles.

Why was the brand sealegend born?

As we all know, the dryers are a must-have electrical appliance in every household, but the long-term lack of cleaning of dryers is also the main cause of annual fires. Therefore, in order to solve the confusion and safety problems of daily cleaning, we began to develop convenient and efficient cleaning kit for dryers, and the Sealegend brand was born.

What makes our products different?

Every Sealegend product is carefully developed by our R&D department. Through a lot of market research, we continue to come up with ideas to solve customer problems, so as to produce suitable products.

What problem are we solving?

Save money and provide effective cleaning tools. Helps solve lots of difficult-to-clean problems.

Dryer vent cleaner kit

Vent Cleaner Kit Lint Remover

Dryer Vacuum Attachment

[New design]-Essential for Dryer Vent-Our long attachment hose attaches to your vacuum and lets you clean the deep recesses of your appliances. Perfect for your washing machine, dryer, freeze dryer machine, and more can run more efficiently. Flexible and handy hose is perfect for removing lint build-up beyond you can’t reach
[Improve Dryer Performance] The dryer that cannot be cleaned for many years accumulates a lot of dirt. The vents will become narrow or even blocked. Our dryer lint vacuum attachment can clean the vents effectively and make your equipment runs more efficiently
[Helps Prevent Fires] The dust lint is the main cause of fire in the dryer. Every year there are tens of thousands of fires caused by the failure of the dryer. So we need this dryer vent cleaner kit to keep cleaning of the dryer and prevent fires
[A Cost-Effective Cleaning Kit] Dryer Lint Cleaner kit adds years to your appliances. You will have saved more money in cleaning and maintenance costs. Not only that, but you are helping them avoid lint fires. Keep them safe and protect the performance of dryer. It is valuable for you to choose this dryer vent vacuum hose
[2 Types of Hoses can be Switched for Use] In order to adapt to different dryer vents, we provide two types of hoses. When switching use, you only need to remove the adapter and the hose connection to connect to the corresponding long hose.

***In order to adapt to different dryer vents, we provide two types of hoses.

***When switching use, you only need to remove the adapter and the hose connection and then connect to the corresponding long hose.

1. What do you get ?

One round hose with guide wire, one flat hose, and one adpater.

Paid one and you can get more kinds of way to clean your dryer easy and effectively

2. What can this Dryer Vent Vacuum Cleaner Attachment help you?

(1)This dryer vent cleaner can attached to your vacuum and reach to fit into the narrow crevice of your machine. Don’t worry about the corner you can’t clean.

(2)This attachment is a time and money saver! It makes dryer cleaning extremely fast and easy.

(3)Before this, cleaning the dryer maybe a nightmare. And you always ingnore to clean the dryer vent. Now this attachment is a time and money saver for you ! It makes dryer cleaning extremely fast and easy.

(4)If there something wrong with my filter vent in my dryer, You don’t need to buy a new filter vent and firstly just use the dryer vent Cleaner Kit to clean vent and get away from the a mess lint in bottom of filter.

Multiple Using Features

Read more

Read more

The part 2 of the round hose is already attached to the round hose-Version 2

If you need to switch, you need to remove the part 2 and all flat hose, and then connect the Version 2

From the brand

Depets, founded in 2016, is a professional pet supply brand. We specialize in pet daily necessities, toys, cleaning and grooming supplies.

Over the years, we have been dedicated to providing high-quality products and great services to pets and pet owners around the world. Our goal is to make a better life for pets with every pet owner.

cat feeder, cat cone, cat door

pet supplies

pet toys, pet carrier sling

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 9.37 x 5.43 x 2.17 inches; 5.61 Ounces
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Depets
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08FJ655HL

Great Brush, Healthy Pets. The cat grooming brush with round beads can do massage for your pets and prevent scratching your pet’s skin. The design of stainless steel needles with a 60-degree bend and some elasticity is good for preventing skin disease and increasing blood circulation.
One-click Cleaning Button. You just have to Simply push the button and the hair will be super simple removed from the cat hair brush. Furthermore, our dog grooming brush is washable, which can be kept in clean.
Comfortable and Nonslip Handle. Our cat shedding brush is designed with a comfort-grip and nonslip handle, and this self cleaning cat brush also has a massage function for your hand and you won’t get tired easily when you brush your pet.
Enjoyable Brushing Experience. Grooming pets can strengthen communication and further the bond between you and your pets. Our pet brush is suitable for all breeds and coat types. With Depets dog and cat shedding brush, your beloved pet will enjoy the time of grooming.

From a variety kind of pet brushes, I chose this one for my own lovely pets (Yoyo & Yiyi). Every time I brush Yiyi, she rubs my hand and makes enjoyable meow. As for my doggy Yoyo, she always has a happy face when I do this to her. We all love this cat and dog shedding brush, so I want to share it with every pet owner and I hope you and your beloved pet will enjoy it like us.

Washable:Washable feature keep the brush hygienic

Size: 7.7″ ×4.1″(L×W)

Color: blue + white

Material: Stainless steel + ABS Plastic + Rubber

Read more

The round end of the needles can do massage for your pets without scratching his/her skins, which is good for preventing skin disease and increasing blood circulation.

The comfort-grip handle is designed to prevent hand and wrist strain.

Read more

Valuable Brush. This cat slicker brush can easily remove loose hair, shedding Mats, tangled hair, Dander and Dirt of your lovely pets, our cat brushes for indoor cats not only keep your pets clean, but also provide you with a hygienic home environment.

Healthy Pet. The dog shedding brush with round beads can increase blood circulation and keep your pet’s coat soft and shiny.

Read more

Usage

Step1: Brush your pet with gentle move.

Step2: Click the button.

Step3: Remove the hair from the pet brush.

Read more

How to reduce the pain during brushing?

  1. Hold the hair root with one hand, comb along the direction of hair growth with the other hand;
  2. When the hair knots are serious behind the ears and on the neck, the movements should be gentle;
  3. Comb the long hair layer by layer, turning the outer layer over and combing the inner layer.

What if my pet doesn’t like this dog and cat hair brush?

You can guide with snack, lengthen the grooming time every day, our self cleaning slicker brush is gentle and not stimulating, your cute pet will gradually like it.

Note:

  1. Store out of reach of children.
  2. Stress may cause skin irritation, you should brush your pet gently.
  3. Be careful with pets that suffer from skin irritation or weak skin sensitivity.

Read more

The Wahl waterless, no rinse lavender & chamomile shampoo is great for shampooing between baths. Formulated with all-natural plant-based cleansers. Our waterless shampoo moisturizes hair by penetrating & sealing in natural sugars & proteins. The lavender chamomile fragrance is designed to give your pet a fresh and clean smell without having to give them a full bath. Our plant derived cleanses make our waterless shampoos the choice for owners who want to avoid harsh chemicals for their dogs and themselves. Our shampoos are PEG-80 free, alcohol free, paraben free, and pH balanced. Wahl has been serving professional vets and groomers for over 50 years. We are a company of animal lovers that want the best for your family member.

Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ USA

No Rinsing Necessary – For dogs, cats, horses, or other animals that don’t like wet shampoos; no rinsing necessary, simply dry with a towel & brush coat
Calming Formula – This plant derived lavender & chamomile scented waterless shampoo is great for cleansing, conditioning, detangling, & moisturizing animals; our calming formula settles restless animals during cleaning.
Safe Usage Instructions – Although a hypoallergenic formula, we advise testing a small amount for your pets first time and dry thoroughly to make sure your pet tolerates the cleansing agents
The Brand Used by Professionals – Wahl has been serving professional vets and groomers for over 50 years. clean, condition fur & hair for a smooth, soft coat. We are a company of animal lovers that want the best for your family member

Main Benefits Large head size that is able to easily cover large sections of hair. Dual level pins safely remove hair from the upper and lower coat while protecting the skin. Large head size that easily covers large sections of hair. Dual level pins safely remove hair from the upper and lower coat while protecting the skin. Bristles shine the coat during brushing. The double sided dual head is designed for multiple uses. Multi level pins detangle and remove dead fur. Flea & tick comb removes flea eggs and ticks from beneath your pets coat. Shedding blade is double sided, one side is course and the other is fine. The blade separates at the handle which allows the blade area to expand by double to cover large and small areas. Unique Textured Wipes — The two sides of the dog dental care wipes are different. One side add friction particles to make physical scrub to clean teeth more powerfully. One side is textured, soft and clean the gums without hurt.
REACH TO BACK TEETH FOR DEEP CLEAN –These dental care finger wipes will make cleaning your dog’s teeth so much easier than gauze or finger brushes. It’s slimmer, so it slides easily between the dogs cheeks and teeth, allows you to reach & feel each tooth and won’t slip off your finger.
PORTABLE & EASY TO USE — Just take out a dog teeth cleaning wipes wipes and sleeve on finger. Then wipe teeth and gum in circle motion. Presoaked wipes don’t need more steps, so it’s convenient to use anywhere, such as home, park, road trip, picnic ,etc. 100pcs Disposable wipes is enough for a long time.
UNSCENTED & SAFE — Our dog dental care wipes is unscented. No need to worry that pets hate to use it because of strange smell. (Please screw the lids tight after use.)

Comprehensive care for pet’s oral health

Safe and effective to clean the teeth and gums without hurt.

From the brand

Xindell was established in 2016, focusing on the cleaning and maintenance of car windshields, and has professional and meticulous car care products and services, OEM car replacement parts.

Xindell Windshield Cleaner ensure that apart from online avenue, we have a strategic location, investing in state-of-the-art equipment and excellent friendly staff.

What Makes Our Products Unique?

a)Fast and Easy to Cleaning Auto Windshield

b)Get to the hard-to-reach area of vehicle windshield pretty well

c)Car windshield cleaning kit designed with 180°swiveled triangular head to make a complete contact to the glass

d)Fit with the glass surface very well

e)Multiple Uses

f)Anti-skid & Durable

How to Clean Inside Car Windows?

Spray your preferred brand of glass cleaner on the microfiber cleaning cloth and wipe down the inside of the windshield. This should remove what did not come off with just the microfiber cloth.

SHOP XINDELL STORE

Fast and Easy to Cleaning Auto Windshield: Most used to dread cleaning their car mainly because of that it was a big hassle to clean the windshield. Not anymore! Clean car window interiors and exteriors. No more hurting your back. The windshield cleaner is designed with the Extra Long extension handle and pivoting head getting to those hard-to-reach car window bases is simple. XINDELL windshield cleaning tool can remove more dirt and dust, easy to clean the hard-to-reach areas effortlessly.
Helps get the hard-to-reach area of vehicle windshield pretty well! Car windshield cleaning kit designed with 180°swiveled triangular head to make a complete contact to the glass, which fit with the glass surface very well, easy to clean the bottom of car windows or some hard-to-reach areas, from interior to exterior, easy to use and effortless. Long ergonomic handle, easily extend to hard-to-reach window bases, leaving surfaces for even cleaning.
Multiple Uses: Works great as a fog & moisture removal tool. Easy windshield cleaner is safe to use on all surfaces and won’t scratch, ideal for interior & exterior cleaning, great for cars, such as trucks, SUVs and recreational vehicles of all sizes. The EASY windshield cleaning brush tool also are suitable for kitchens, bathrooms, furniture, mirrors, ceramic, shower stalls and other household needs! Also ideal for de-misting your windscreen in winter. No need to wait your vehicle warm up.
Anti-skid & Durable: The cleaning pad pole use aluminum alloy material, lightweight and won’t rust, more durable than plastic one, the end of the handle is with soft sponge, non-slip and comfortable to hold. 3 pcs Washable & Reusable Pads made of fine fiber fluffed material, can remove more dirt and dust, easy to clean, which helps keep it effective. The microfiber cloth helps to remove dirt, dust, and fingerprints on the glass. Great Design Car Window Cleaner!
Special Instructions: ●Interior Windshield Cleaning: Can be used dry pad or spray a small amount of water on the pad and wipe clean. Refrain from drenching the surface or smudges will appear. ●Exterior Windshield Cleaning: Can be used dry pad. ●Fog Removal: simply wipe glass with no added water or liquid chemical. ●Stubborn stains on the glass: Can be spray a little Glass Cleaning Fluid for wiping. ●No chemical or soap is needed to clean the surface, just a little water.

XINDELL UPGRADE WINDSHIELD CLEANING TOOL

The ultimate design goal of XINDELL windshield cleaner is to easily clean the car.

  • Is it hard for you to clean the whole of your car’s windscreen?
  • Does dirty windshield annoy you?
  • Is it always fog and moisture?
  • No longer worry about that as XINDELL windshield cleaner tool can be your good partner to clean your car windshield at ease.

Read more

The windshield cleaning tool can remove dust ,dirt and fingerprints on the glass, easy to clean the hard-to-reach areas.

-Ergonomic Design

–

  • The windshield cleaner with the long extendable handle and pivoting head easily reach into the driver and passenger side corner and other angles.
  • The windshield cleaner with the long extendable handle and pivoting head easily reach into the driver and passenger side corner and other angles.

– Product Instructions

–

  • When you clean the windshield: you can use a dry pad to wipe the dust; You also can spray slight water or glass cleaning liquid on the pad to wipe the stubborn stains. Don’t wet the cloth completely.
  • Remove the mist from the internal windshield: you can directly use our window brush to wipe it.
  • No chemicals or soap are needed to clean the pads, just water.

-Replaceable windshield brush pads

–

  • Made of microfiber material can remove more dust and dirt, easy to clean, washable, and reusable.
  • The Windshield Cleaning Tool Kit includes:
  • 1 * Car Windshield Cleaner
  • 3 * Microfiber Bonnets
  • 1 * Empty Spray Bottle

JUSTTOP Windshield Cleaning Tool, Car Window Cleaner with Unbreakable Extendable Long-Reach Handle and Washable Reusable Microfiber Cloth, Car Exterior Accessories, Green
Extendable Handle: The extendable handle not only contains the soft sponge cover to ensure your comfort when cleaning the window; but also the adjustable length of the handle also makes it easier to clean the vehicle glass. The handle is 9.45-15.35 inch and whole cleaner is 10.83-16.73 inch, which is long enough to allow you to clean any position of the car glass.
180°Swiveled Triangular Head: Designed with pivoting Square head to make a complete contact to the glass, which can be rotated 180 degrees to fit the glass surface very well, easy to clean the bottom of car windows or some hard-to-reach areas, easy to use and effortless.
Removable Microfiber Cloth Pads: The car window cleaner includes 3 pieces of microfiber pads for easy replacement, wet and dry use. The towel is made of soft microfiber and the surface of the fabric is finely treated , which must clean your vehicle well and never cause streaking after cleaning.
Wide Application: The windshield cleaner is great for all size cars, SUV, trucks, Jeeps, UTVs, ATVs and so on. You can also used for cleaning house, include windows, television, monitor, kitchen walls, bathrooms mirrors, even tables and floors at home.
Easy Use: Simply slip one of the microfiber cloth cover on the head, spray with water, and start washing.

Product Description

Why Choose KUSUFE Plastic Razor Blade Scraper?

Are you still annoying about the difficult removal of labels, decals, stickers, glue, paint, adhesive, food residue, etc.?

Are you still using your fragile nails to remove the above stains?

If so, then it is time for you to take KUSUFEFI Plastic Scrapers around your house, and you will find that your cleaning has never been so easy.

Warm Tips:

1. When you replace the blade, please note that the tips on both sides of the blade are somewhat sharp.

2. Since the plastic blade is double-sided, when one side becomes blunt, you can use the other side to continue using.

3. For some particularly stubborn stains, we recommend to use the remover and plastic scraper together to achieve the best cleaning effect.

What Will You Get?

Including 2pcs scrapers and 60pcs extra plastic double edged blades, helps you save more money.

MAKE YOU CLEAN COMFORTABLY: Our plastic blade scraper adopts an ergonomic curved handle design. The dent on the handle is specially designed for your thumb to be placed on it while working, providing you with comfortable control and saving your time and energy
SAFE CLEANING SCRAPER TOOL: Two slots on the back of the blade scraper securely hold the plastic razor blades to ensure that the blade will not slip out. The plastic blade is sharp but safe, you won’t worry about this scraper multitool cutting your fingers while working
SCRATCH FREE SCRAPER TOOL: Our plastic scraper consists of a sturdy ABS handle and plastic blade. It removes stubborn stains more easily, but it won’t scratch the surfaces like metal blades. You can use it on paint, glass, metal, wood, plastic, and tile surfaces safely
MULTI-PURPOSE CLEANING SCRAPER: This sticker scraper tool is ideal for removing decals, stickers, tints, labels from windows, cars, RV, walls, tiles, floors, paint, wood, and glass. It can also remove food residues from oven, cooktop, and glass stove top
HANGING DESIGN FOR EASIER STORAGE: This plastic razor scraper tool is lightweight and portable pocket-sized, making it very easy to carry and store. What are you still hesitating? Just to equip your kitchen, garage, RV, tool bag with such an interesting scraper tool
